heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy north, mostly clear south. Lows from zero to 10 above, cold hollows around 5 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny south, partly cloudy north, with the chance of a sprinkle or flurry in the St. Lawrence Valley. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40, some lower 30s northeast and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Winds becoming south 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Fair early, then increasing clouds. Lows in the teens to around 20 east of the Greens, 20s to around 30 west. Light south winds in the valleys east of the Greens, 5 to 10 mph in the west, gusting to 35 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
